hedline.hl1: New Effort by Wells For Benson & Hedges

block.p: LEAD: Wells, Rich, Greene, which has handled the Benson & Hedges account since Philip Morris introduced the cigarette in 1966, has targeted an adult audience for a national campaign scheduled to break this month in magazines and newspapers.

Wells, Rich, Greene, which has handled the Benson & Hedges account since Philip Morris introduced the cigarette in 1966, has targeted an adult audience for a national campaign scheduled to break this month in magazines and newspapers.
The new campaign apparently impressed the Benson & Hedges people enough that they dropped any ideas of shopping around for a new agency.
